install_cpp_deps.sh.description: Installs common C++ build dependencies (CMake, compilers, OpenSSL, zlib, Brotli, curl, pkg-config, zstd) on various systems (apt, yum, brew).

install_common_dev_deps.sh.description: Installs common development dependencies (git, python3, pip) across various systems (apt, yum, brew).

install_autotools_deps.sh.description: Installs dependencies for building autotools-based projects (autoconf, automake, libtool, build-essential) on various systems (apt, yum, brew).
